description: Wakas is a mass consumption company based in Argentina that specializes in producing gluten-free pasta using non-traditional ingredients such as beans, quinoa, amaranth, chia, and kale. The company aims to enhance food security by transforming these nutritious but less commonly consumed ingredients into easily accessible pasta products. Wakas sources 100% of its ingredients from local producers, fostering relationships with various communities across Argentina to support local agriculture. Wakas not only focuses on the domestic market but has also expanded its reach internationally, exporting products to countries like Chile, Paraguay, Brazil, and the USA. The company emphasizes innovation and quality, participating in international food fairs to showcase its unique offerings and build brand recognition.
name: Wakas
